tasks.title: Full Claude Code + SLATE Integration (Unified AI Backend)
tasks.description: Complete integration of Claude Code into SLATE: Created unified_ai_backend.py with 3 providers (Ollama, Claude Code, Foundry Local). Added CLAUDECODE agent to instruction_loader.py. Created claude-code-inference super prompt. Updated FORGE.md, AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, README.md, GitHub Pages, tech tree. All 26 validation checks passed. MCP server has 12 tools with full handlers. VS Code extensions compiled. 12 skills, 20 commands, 10 prompts operational.
tasks.file_paths: slate/unified_ai_backend.py, slate/instruction_loader.py, prompts/claude-code-inference.prompt.md, prompts/index.json, FORGE.md, AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md, README.md, docs/pages/index.html, .slate_tech_tree/tech_tree.json

tasks.title: SLATE Dashboard integration for Antigravity agent
tasks.description: Created dashboard_client.py (34 API endpoints), K8s antigravity-bridge deployment (NodePort 30085), slate-dashboard agent skill, integrated into index.py v1.2.0, built slate-antigravity VS Code extension v5.2.0 with SLATE Dark theme, sidebar dashboard webview, @antigravity chat participant (27 commands, 36 tools). Dashboard connected via K8s bridge → slate-dashboard-svc:8080.

tasks.title: @slate extension web host integration for Antigravity plugin
tasks.description: Expanded slate-antigravity plugin from stub to full entry point (index.py v1.1.0). Plugin registers as ANTIGRAVITY agent, integrates with Copilot Bridge at port 8083, handles tasks via Ollama (slate-coder/planner/fast), reads/writes FORGE.md, loads/executes 9 super-prompts. Docker volumes for FORGE.md and prompts/ added to both dev and prod compose files. SLATE_PLUGIN_ANTIGRAVITY env flag enabled.

tasks.title: FORGE.md collaboration hub + super-prompt hardening (local-only models)
tasks.description: Antigravity session: Acknowledged Copilot handoff in FORGE.md. Fixed 5 super-prompts (issue-to-task, pr-review, task-router, dashboard-sync, forge-collab) — changed model references from external (sonnet/haiku) to local Ollama models (slate-planner/slate-coder/slate-fast). Added Gemini authorship markers. Total prompts: 9 (4 original + 5 super-prompts).
tasks.file_paths: FORGE.md, prompts/issue-to-task.prompt.md, prompts/pr-review.prompt.md, prompts/task-router.prompt.md, prompts/dashboard-sync.prompt.md, prompts/forge-collab.prompt.md

tasks.title: Unified Vendor SDK Integration (5 vendors)
tasks.description: Created unified vendor integration system: vendor_integration.py for status/testing, vendor_autogen_sdk.py for AutoGen multi-agent framework. Updated claude_agent_sdk_integration.py with AutoGen imports. All 5 vendors (openai-agents, autogen, semantic-kernel, copilot-sdk, spec-kit) fully integrated with 5/5 tests passing. ChromaDB rebuilt with 3145 documents.

tasks.title: Fork Sync System with 16 Vendor Dependencies
tasks.description: Created slate/slate_fork_sync.py - comprehensive fork management system tracking 16 forked dependencies from OpenAI, Microsoft, NVIDIA, HuggingFace, and Anthropic. Submodules: openai-agents-python, semantic-kernel, autogen, copilot-sdk, spec-kit. Features: --status, --sync-all, --analyze, --upstream, --list commands. K8s-aware service configuration added to guided_mode.py, guided_workflow.py, and slate_semantic_kernel.py.

tasks.title: Multi-Runner System (19 parallel runners across 2 GPUs)
tasks.description: Created slate_runner_benchmark.py and slate_multi_runner.py for resource-aware parallel task distribution. Benchmarked system: 2x RTX 5070 Ti = 6 GPU light + 1 GPU heavy runners, plus 12 CPU runners. Created multi-runner.yml workflow for dual hosted+self-hosted execution. Updated VSCode settings and added /slate-multirunner command.

tasks.title: SLATE Meta-Workflow System (self-managing workflows)
tasks.description: Created slate_workflow_analyzer.py for self-managing workflows. Identifies deprecated patterns, redundant workflows, and ensures all development categories have proper coverage. Updated tech tree to v2.0 with Phase 2 nodes. Updated slate.agent.md with workflow categories.

tasks.title: Docker infrastructure for SLATE (GPU + CPU variants)
tasks.description: Created Docker infrastructure: Dockerfile (GPU with CUDA 12.4), Dockerfile.cpu (lightweight), docker-compose.yml with Ollama sidecar, .dockerignore, and .github/workflows/docker.yml for CI/CD to ghcr.io

tasks.title: Fix discover_work() to not short-circuit on completed/stale tasks
tasks.description: The _load_pending_tasks() returns immediately if ANY pending tasks exist, preventing coverage/tech tree/Nemo discovery from running. Fix: filter out stale tasks before returning, or continue to other discovery sources even when pending tasks exist.

tasks.title: Diagnose and fix dashboard crash (exit code 1)
tasks.description: The SLATE Dashboard task exits with code 1 immediately on startup. Investigate slate_dashboard_server.py / agents/slate_dashboard_server.py for the root cause and fix.

tasks.title: Add new tech tree nodes for Phase 2 capabilities (UV, Discord)
tasks.description: All 16 tech tree nodes are 100% complete. Add new Phase 2 nodes: UV package manager migration, Discord bot completion (#17). Set status to 'available' so autonomous discovery finds them.

tasks.title: Phase 3 Expansion: Token System + Brand Identity + Avatar + Microsoft Dependency Analysis
tasks.description: Created slate_token_system.py (26 bootstrapped tokens: 11 service, 8 agent, 5 plugin, 1 wiki, 1 MCP). Created 3 new specs (022-brand, 023-avatar, 024-trellis). Analyzed TRELLIS.2 and 24 Microsoft repos. Updated fork sync (16→24 deps with 8 new MS repos). Updated tech tree v3.0.0 (45 nodes, 61 edges). Updated CLAUDE.md, FORGE.md. Forked TRELLIS.2.
tasks.file_paths: slate/slate_token_system.py, specs/022-slate-brand-identity/spec.md, specs/023-slate-avatar-system/spec.md, specs/024-trellis-3d-integration/spec.md, slate/slate_fork_sync.py, .slate_tech_tree/tech_tree.json, CLAUDE.md, FORGE.md
